statements: DELETE FROM VehicleMaintenanceSchedule WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND last_maintenance_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'oil change' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name LIKE 'Toyota%' AND last_maintenance_date <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM VehicleData WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND total_mileage < 50000;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date < '2021-01-01' AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM UsageData WHERE vehicle_id = 2003 AND mileage < 50000;
